person.persName: Van Buren Bellamy (Ballard County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. Virginia native. Son of James A. Bellamy and Alverina Bellamy. Farm laborer in Ballard County in 1860. Private in the 30th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) from February 19, 1864 to April 18, 1865.
